data.client_settings: PC - Discord Stable 0.0.297 & iOS Device - Discord 1.8.8
data.actual_result: The voice channel name stays white.
data.expected_result: The voice channel name you were connected to on your iOS device should turn back to gray.
data.short_description: If you try to connect to a voice channel on PC and a different vc on iOS, it'll say "Reconnect" on PC. If you press it, the channel you were connected on iOS will turn white.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get on a PC and an iOS device - Go to a server with several voice channels - Connect to one voice channel on Desktop, and one voice channel on iOS at the same exact time - Then press "Reconnect" on Desktop
